cause.description:
From April to June 2008 I will be embarking on a 3 month trip to Tanzania. Here I will be teaching English and taking care of the young African orphans. I need to raise £2500 for the project, with is run through the Mondo Challenge foundation.
More info can be found on www.theroadtoafrica.co.uk
Every little helps!
1. We take for granted how many privelages we have!
2. I want to help all those orphans who have been abandoned
3. I believe in equality
cause.mission: Raise £2500 to help young orphans in an orphanage in Tanzania as a volunteer
cause.name: The Road to Africa
